string.value: I've learned the Super Transformation Skill but I don't really know how to use it freely as of yet. I can't figure out what the problem is! I'd better ask Kyrin.

I apparently need to do some intense training in order to be able to freely use the Super Transformation Skill. One of the benefits of the skill is that it will strengthen me and give me a body of steel! I'd better go observe the Red Dragon Turtles whose bodies are equally as hard, and try to stand up against them. To prove that I've done the training, I must defeat #r150 Red Dragon Turtles#k and bring #b50 Hearts of Stone#k to Kyrin.

고민이 있는 듯한 표정이군. 무슨 일이 있는거야? 흐음... 슈퍼트랜스폼이 아직 몸에 익혀지지 않는다는 거야? 훗~ 걱정마. 아직 훈련이 부족해서 그러는 거니. 슈퍼트랜스폼을 적극적으로 사용하다 보면 어느 순간 자유자재로 슈퍼트랜스폼을 사용하고 있는 나를 발견할 수 있지.
쉽고 빠르게 몸에 익힐 수 있는 훈련이 있는데 한번 받아보겠어?
슈퍼트랜스폼을 사용할 때 냉정한 마음도 필요하지. 마음을 비우고 사용해야 한다는 말이야. 아직 마음이 여린 것 같은데... 리프레에 가면 레드 드래곤터틀이란 몬스터가 있지. 심장이 돌로 되어 있어 잔혹하고 냉정하지. 물론 그들을 보고 배우라는 것은 아니지만 어느 정도 참고를 해두라는 거야. 즉, 이번 훈련은 레드 드래곤 터틀을 상대하는 거지.
훈련의 결과가 좋으면 선물도 주겠어. 슈퍼트랜스폼으로 사용할 수 있는 스킬을 가르쳐 주지. 어때? 좋아. 자, 그럼 가서 #r레드 드래곤터틀 150마리#k를 무찌르고 훈련의 증거로 레드 드래곤터틀의 #b돌의 심장 50개#k를 모아와.
아직 훈련의 필요성을 못 느끼나보군. 새로운 스킬이 배우고 싶다면 언제든지 찾아와.

You seem concerned about something. What is it? Hmmm... are you worried that you have not mastered Super Transformation yet? Haha, don't worry about it. It just means you need more training. Keep practicing Super Transformation and one day, you'll find yourself using the skill without even thinking.
There's a training method that'll allow you to master the skill more quickly. Are you interested?

When you use Super Transformation, it is imperative that you have a stone-cold demeanor. That means you should use this without any mood swings or thoughts into it. It looks like you still have a soft spot in your heart, so... head over to Leafre, and you'll encounter a monster named Red Dragon Turtle. Its heart is made out of stone, and it is both ruthless and cold-blooded. Now, I am not saying you should emulate them, but I do want you to take note. Yes, you will be facing the Red Dragon Turtle.

If the training ends well, then I'll even give you a small reward. I'll teach you a skill that you can use through Super Transformation. What do you think? Now, go ahead and defeat #r150 Red Dragon Turtles#k. I also need evidence that you really did slay the Red Dragon Turtles, so I want you to bring back #b50 Hearts of Stone#k.
I don't think you understand the importance of training, yet. If you want to learn a new skill, come see me.

That was a great training session! What was it like facing the Red Dragon Turtle? Weren't they powerful? I am sure they were... but if you train yourself a bit harder, then you'll end up much more powerful than that. As a reward for safely completing the task, I'll teach you how to use "Snatch".
Snatch is a powerful, powerful skill that can only be used when you are under the #bSuper Transformation#k. Please use this skill wisely...
You need to bring in 50 Hearts of Stone. That's what I'd call training.
You need to defeat 150 Red Dragon Turtles. That's what I'd call training.
